name: Tiny Touring Cars
description:
Tiny Touring Cars is a fun, easy to pick up and play, top-down arcade racing game. Designed for you and your friends (8 players max) to have some fun racing in local multiplayer or using Steam Remote Play or for you to compete in time trials to set the best lap times Locally or on the Steam Leaderboards. Race on 9 unique tracks, in one of 3 unique cars.

Features:
- 4 Local Players from a single Keyboard.
- 8 Local Players up to 4 from one keyboard, up to from individual 8 controllers.
- Fully remappable Keys
- Steam Remote Play using (requires controllers)
- 3 Unique Cars
- 9 Unique Tracks
- In Game Fastest Lap tracking
